articles.title: Huawei Watch 3 and 3 Pro get special Robert Lewandowski watch faces - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
articles.description: The footballer is the ambassador for Huawei in multiple European countries.
articles.content: Robert Lewandowski has been the face of Huawei products in various European countries for a few years, now the company has decided to honor the footballer with a special watch face for the new Huawei… [+656 chars]

articles.author: GMA News Online
articles.title: EU takes up option to buy 150 million more Moderna COVID-19 shots - GMA News Online
articles.description: The European Union has decided to take up an option under a supply contract with drugmaker Moderna that allows the bloc to order 150 million additional COVID-19 vaccines produced by the US biotech firm, the EU Commission said on Tuesday.
